summary: dmaengine: idxd: fix wq cleanup of WQCFG registers
details:
dmaengine: idxd: fix wq cleanup of WQCFG registers

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.11.16 by commit f7dc8f5619165e1fa3383d0c2519f502d9e2a1a9, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit da32b28c95a79e399e18c03f8178f41aec9c66e4. For more details please see the references link.
